how would you describe your main use cas: Note-taking;As a knowledge base (including technical, non-fiction and encyclopaedic content)
do you share your tiddlywiki(s) with oth: No, but I may export content into other formats and share individual tiddlers, the whole wiki, or an extract of the wiki
putting it all together, what value does: Helps me greatly to organize the large amount of constantly changing information that I need to manage for my work. In my personal life, I use it to organize the notes I take from books and articles, to discover more connections between the things I read, to retain more knowledge
what is your level of ability with tiddl: I have customised TiddlyWiki through options and plugins;I am comfortable using WikiText widgets (e.g. <$transclude>, <$list>...);I am comfortable writing filter expressions
how do you back up/sync changes between: Consumer online storage (e.g. Google Drive, Dropbox);Web or cloud hosting (other than TiddlyHost/TiddlySpot e.g. Netlify, AWS, OVH, Google Cloud...)
